qas.question: What is it called when the tax rate and base amount increase simultaneously?
What tax rate has a direct relationship with income inequality?
What can work to even the distribution of wealth?

answers.text: steeper tax progressivity applied to social spending

qas.question: What system has an impact on income inequality?
In a progressive tax, what increases as the taxable base amount increases?
What will have a direct impact of inequality in a system that uses a progressive tax?

answers.text: level of the top tax rate
level of the top tax rate

qas.question: What can result in more equal distribution of income?
What index is an indicator of the effects of taxes applied to social spending?
What is it called when the tax rate and base amount decrease simultaneously?
What tax rate has an indirect relationship with income inequality?
What can't work to even the distribution of wealth?
What system has no impact on income inequality?
In a progressive tax, what increases as the taxable base amount decreases?
